00052 class ArgsAdaptor {
00053   public:
00054     ArgsAdaptor() {}
00055     virtual ~ArgsAdaptor() {}
00056     virtual int32_t getArgsCount() { return 0; }
00057 };
00058 
00059 template <class T0, class T1>
00060 class ArgsAdaptor2: public ArgsAdaptor {
00061   public:
00062     T0 mT_0;
00063     T1 mT_1;
00064 
00065   public:
00066     ArgsAdaptor2(T0 t0, T1 t1)
00067             : mT_0(t0),
00068               mT_1(t1) {}
00069 
00070     ~ArgsAdaptor2() {}
00071 
00072     int32_t getArgsCount() { return 2; }
00073 };

00078 class ComponentLoader {
00079   private:
00080     ComponentLoader();
00081     ~ComponentLoader();
00082 
00083   public:
00087     static ComponentLoader* getDefault();
00088 
00092     void setToUnLoadLibrary();
00093 
00097     void registerComponent(ComponentType type, const char* classname,
00098         void* maker);
00099 
00103     void unregisterComponent(const char* classname);
00104 
00108     template<class BASE>
00109     BASE* newInstance(const char* classname);
00110 
00111     template<class BASE>
00112     BASE* newInstance(const char* classname, ArgsAdaptor* argsAdaptor);
00113 
00119     void loadLibraries(const char* path, bool recursive = false);
00120 
00126     void unloadLibraries(const char* path, bool recursive = false);
00127 
00131     ComponentType getType(const char* classname);
00132 
00133   private:
00134     void* getMaker(ComponentType type, const char* classname);
00135 
00136     bool mIsUnloadLibrary;
00137 };
00138 
00139 template<class BASE>
00140 BASE* ComponentLoader::newInstance(const char* classname) {
00141   void* maker = getMaker(COMPONENT_UNKNOWN, classname);
00142   return maker != 0 ? ((BASE* (*)())maker)() : reinterpret_cast<BASE*>(0);
00143 }
